message: Starting comprehensive audit of real_mcp_server.py for resource cleanup mechanisms
Reading file structure - identified key resource functions: create_tmux_session, kill_tmux_session. Now searching for agent deployment and cleanup logic
Confirmed major finding: update_agent_progress (line 4289-4327) validates completion but never triggers resource cleanup. Now analyzing get_agent_output and other resource access points
Completed resource inventory. Now creating comprehensive audit report with cleanup coverage matrix and gap analysis

AUDIT COMPLETE: Comprehensive resource cleanup audit delivered in output/CURRENT_STATE_AUDIT.md. Documented 8 resource types, analyzed 6 key functions, identified 3 critical gaps, provided 9 prioritized recommendations with 3-phase implementation roadmap. Evidence: 54 processes for 4 agents, 78 prompt files, 38 logs - proving systematic resource leaks.
